Title: Cornered
Writer: Hunter G. Williams (screenplay), Scott Michael Campbell (contributing writer), Ryan O'Corrigan, Kevin Duane Carson (story)
Actors: Hunter G. Williams, Heather McComb, Scott Michael Campbell, Tommy 'Tiny' Lister
Plot: A Los Angeles Homicide detective must stop a government trained Serial killer before the agency that trained him can cover it up and, before the killer finds a new victim.
